properties.areaDesc: Michigan City IN to New Buffalo MI; New Buffalo MI to St Joseph MI
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 17 at 3:29AM EST until February 19 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Northern Indiana
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Northern Indiana has issued a
Small Craft Advisory, which is in effect from 4 AM Tuesday to
10 AM EST Wednesday.

* WINDS...West 15 to 25 knots late tonight. Northwest 15 to 25
knots Tuesday.

* WAVES...3 to 7 feet. Occasionally to 9 feet on Tuesday in
Michigan nearshore waters.
properties.instruction:
A small craft advisory means that sustained winds or frequent
gusts of 22 to 33 knots are likely...and/or waves greater than
4 feet are expected. Inexperienced mariners...especially those
operating smaller vessels should avoid navigating in these
conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TUESDAY TO 10 AM EST WEDNESDAY
